00038 //TTB 0-8 are button-ids, which also correspond to their
00039 //position in mButtons.  9 & 10 are ids for sliders, which aren't
00040 //in the button array.
00041 enum
00042    {
00043       TTB_PlaySpeed,
00044       TTB_StartOn,
00045       TTB_EndOn,
00046       TTB_StartOff,
00047       TTB_EndOff,
00048       TTB_SelectSound,
00049       TTB_SelectSilence,
00050       TTB_AutomateSelection,
00051       TTB_MakeLabel,
00052       TTB_Calibrate,
00053 
00054       TTB_SensitivitySlider,
00055       TTB_PlaySpeedSlider,
00056       TTB_KeyType
00057    };
00058 
00059 #define TTBNumButtons 10
00060
